title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message:
boards looks clean.

PPDCIN_G3H - 1-2v both side
smc_bc_acok = 0v

what i need to do from here, i've never work on this model.
u7100 area looks fresh.

every few minutes the MagSafe will flash green light and fan move a little for a spit second.

ISL =
7/18 = 3.1 omhs
27/18 = 20 ohms

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message: mmm, it post using battery power, i can hear keyboard sound. but no images nor backlight. can charge battery with orange light but no green light.

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message: 3V42 missing on AC is the first thing to fix. Probably an issue around Q7010 or D7010.

message:
now has green light,orange light, fan spin with a magsafe. need to fix no video.

12.57v on both side of lcd fuse

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message: Try a known good LCD, SMC_LID high? Inspect connector/cable.

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message:
nothing showing up on external monitor via hdmi and displayport. 

can i test with a 13" 2014 lcd?

SMC_LID is low - 0v

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message:
SMC_LID should be high, at 0 voIt, SMC thinks the lid is closed so no backlight pwm resulting in no backlight boosting.
Check if SMC_LID signal is not shorted to ground, pulled down by an open resistor or bad trace.
Also water may have corroded the hall sensor J5250.

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message: sorry i got it wrong. smc_lid is at 3.429v

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message:
C9327's pin1 is burnt
c9323's pin1 is dark
r9115's pin1 is slightly burnt but still 34.8K

dead gnu?


PPVCORE_S0_GFX is gpu vcore right? 0.858v
P3V3GPU_EN - 3.3v

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message:
i've replaced  C9327 and c9323

now i get video and backlight.

why this two matter?

title: 820-3787 liquid damaged - no power.
message: They don't unless they were shorted. Something else heated up and made it work again. Expect issue to return.
